command: tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"You made a wild Baryonyx trust you! Keep feeding it every once in a while to eventually tame it!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Your taming progress has been reset!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"You have succesfully tamed a Baryonyx!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Treats are for healing and breeding only! Use regular foods to heal adults or speed up growth for babies!"}]}
loot spawn ~ ~ ~ loot "harvest results/baryonyx/general water drops"
loot spawn ~ ~ ~ loot "harvest results/baryonyx/jungle water drops"
loot spawn ~ ~ ~ loot "harvest results/baryonyx/ocean water drops"
